Follow us in X!

Do not miss any update!!!

Posted on January 22, 2024

For the secodn time, the Mexican NLP Summer School 2024, will be co-located with one of the most important NLP conferences in America, NAACL 2024, this time as an on-site event!

We are eager to provide an engaging and inclusive environment for all who share a passion for NLP technology!

We are working on the program and already have lined up great speakers and tutorials. Check out the Speakers

Follow us in the X platform (@EscuelaPLNmex) if you do not want to miss any news!
